identity.mission: Create a mental wellness platform that feels like a warm hug, not a clinical tool. Reject cold tech aesthetics.
principles: Fusion: Botanical illustrations x Modern SaaS layout
Emotion: Every pixel must whisper 'calm' and 'safety'
Texture: Use grain and paper textures to kill digital flatness
Typography: Expressive serif headings vs clean sans body

rules: Headings (h1-h3) must use Fraunces. Use lighter weights (300-400) for elegance, or italic variants for emphasis.
Body text must use Manrope. Keep line-height loose (1.6-1.8) for readability.
Use 'tracking-tight' for large headings to make them feel cohesive.

usage_rules: Background should be 'cream' (#F4F1DE), not pure white.
Text should be 'deep-navy' (#3D405B), never pure black.
Use 'sage' for success states and calming elements.
Use 'sun' for highlights and playful accents.

spacing.base: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for section padding.
spacing.containers: Rounded corners are mandatory. Use rounded-2xl or rounded-3xl.

grid_system.marketing: Bento Grid (Mode A). Asymmetric layouts. Mix text blocks with image blocks.
grid_system.dashboard: High Density Grid (Mode B). Clean, organized, but with soft edges.

layout.z_index_strategy: Layered depth. Use soft shadows and subtle borders to create lift.

buttons.interaction: Scale down slightly on click (active:scale-95). Hover: brightness-110.
buttons.shadow: Soft, colored shadow matching the button color (e.g., shadow-terracotta/20).

cards.style: White background with very subtle border (border-stone-100).
cards.hover: Lift up (-translate-y-1) and increase shadow intensity.

inputs.style: Soft background (#F9F7F0), no harsh borders. Focus ring should be 'terracotta'.

navigation.position: Sticky top-4 mx-4 rounded-full border border-white/20 shadow-sm.

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the entire body (opacity 0.03) to remove digital sterility.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Use soft, organic gradients (mesh gradients) for backgrounds, not linear gradients.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use Phosphor Icons (Duotone) or Heroicons (Outline) with soft stroke widths.

hero_bg.usage: Hero section background or main visual

blog_header.usage: Blog page header or featured post

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the custom colors and font families.
3. OVERRIDE SHADCN: Modify the base styles in index.css to match the 'cream' background and 'deep-navy' text.
4. CREATE LAYOUT: Build a 'Layout' component that includes the floating navigation and applies the global texture overlay.
5. USE IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for placeholders. Do not use gray boxes.
6. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element has a data-testid attribute.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetics (generic centered layouts, default blues).
Do not use gradients for text unless specifically requested.
Add micro-interactions to everything (hover, focus, active).
